title: New: Jr. Sea – Out of Body Auto-Reply
body:
Possibly the weirdest song title of the year, **Jr.**

**Sea** is a so far anonymous musician, simply referring to himself as J. R. C. _Out of Body Auto-Reply_ is about as upbeat as you’re going to get, likely to draw comparisons to the likes of Local Natives, and Miike Snow, yet with a slightly more sinister edge to it, it’s been a while since I’ve heard a new artist that sounds as fully formed as **Jr. Sea**.. Produced by Tarek Musa (Chateaux, Jethro Fox), it’s one of the most ambitious debut tracks of the year. Check it out below.
